educationComponent.title: Education
educationComponent.description:
The undergraduate degree in Software Engineering at UTFPR-DV is a solid and up-to-date education that prepares students to work in different areas of software engineering. The curriculum includes courses that cover the fundamentals of software engineering, software development techniques, software project management, and software quality. In addition, students have the opportunity to complete internships at companies in the region, which allows them to apply the knowledge they have learned in the classroom.

The course is accredited by the Ministry of Education with a grade of 5, which places it among the best courses in Brazil. The campus also has a modern infrastructure, with computer labs equipped with state-of-the-art technology.
